ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] RE: Pets vs. Familiars
ygData.msgSnippet: Yes, Flappy s one of the little red imps. What server do you play on? Most of my chars are on the Nameless and Rodcet Nife. ... From: Steven R. Hulse To:
ygData.messageBody:
Yes, Flappy's one of the little red imps. What server do you play on? Most of my chars are on the Nameless and Rodcet Nife.
----- Original Message -----
From: Steven R. Hulse
To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Monday, July 22, 2002 12:53 PM
Subject: [EverQuest] RE: Pets vs. Familiars

See that's cool, I can see where he would be some fun. I was thinking
originally that there was some function like a pet. I've seen some of
the familiars that wiz's have and they are really cool. By "Flappy" I'm
guessing that you have one of those little winged demon looking things?
Those are just so cool!

Hey if your ever online look me up and maybe we can group. Granted I
don't have the highest level of characters but they do ok. ;-)

C-ya!
Durgaa 9thlvl Wood Elf Ranger
Shizney 5thlvl Gnome Mage
Genmay 6thlvl Gnome Warrior (With a few buffs the little guy rocks!)

-----Original Message-----
Message: 2
   Date: Sun, 21 Jul 2002 14:34:41 -0400
   From: "The Mad Macinchaote" <scendera@...>
Subject: Re: RE: Pets vs. Familiars

LOL I call mine Flappy too and feed him treats, emote him purring,
biting ppl who are snotty to me, etc. It's at least a cool idea...and
really, a actual pet of any sort would make a wiz overpowered if you
think about it. I'm content with my lil guy, even if he is just a
visible buff.
